attributes.action: Children with ADHD and ASD to have homes with gardens
attributes.additional_details:
All children who have a diagnosis of ADHD and/or ASD should be seen as priority to be housed in a property with outside space for own use!
Housing associations are oblivious to the medical condition and the childs needs.
Lets change this now.
Housing priority for children with ADHD,ASD and other autistic conditions!
